metadata.name: Cognitive Services
metadata.description: This module deploys a Cognitive Service.
Optional. Specify the name of cognitive service account deployment.
Required. The name of Cognitive Services account deployment model.
Required. The format of Cognitive Services account deployment model.
Required. The version of Cognitive Services account deployment model.
Required. Properties of Cognitive Services account deployment model.
Required. The name of the resource model definition representing SKU.
Optional. The capacity of the resource model definition representing SKU.
Optional. The resource model definition representing SKU.
Optional. The name of RAI policy.
Type of the endpoint.
The endpoint URI.
Required. The key vault name where to store the keys and connection strings generated by the modules.
Optional. The name for the accessKey1 secret to create.
Optional. The name for the accessKey2 secret to create.
Optional. FQDN that resolves to private endpoint IP address.
Required. A list of private IP addresses of the private endpoint.
Required. The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group.
Required. The ID of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to.
Required. The member name of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to.
Required. A private IP address obtained from the private endpoint's subnet.
Required. Properties of private endpoint IP configurations.
Optional. The name of the Private DNS Zone Group.
Optional. The name of the private DNS Zone Group config.
Required. The resource id of the private DNS zone.
Required. The private DNS Zone Groups to associate the Private Endpoint. A DNS Zone Group can support up to 5 DNS zones.
The resourceId of the exported secret.
The secret URI of the exported secret.
The secret URI with version of the exported secret.
An AVM-aligned type for the output of the secret set via the secrets export feature.
Required. The resource ID of a key vault to reference a customer managed key for encryption from.
Required. The name of the customer managed key to use for encryption.
Optional. The version of the customer managed key to reference for encryption. If not provided, the deployment will use the latest version available at deployment time.
Optional. User assigned identity to use when fetching the customer managed key. Required if no system assigned identity is available for use.
An AVM-aligned type for a customer-managed key. To be used if the resource type does not support auto-rotation of the customer-managed key.
Optional. The name of the diagnostic setting.
Optional. Name of a Diagnostic Log category for a resource type this setting is applied to. Set the specific logs to collect here.
Optional. Name of a Diagnostic Log category group for a resource type this setting is applied to. Set to `allLogs` to collect all logs.
Optional. Enable or disable the category explicitly. Default is `true`.
Optional. The name of logs that will be streamed. "allLogs" includes all possible logs for the resource. Set to `[]` to disable log collection.
Required. Name of a Diagnostic Metric category for a resource type this setting is applied to. Set to `AllMetrics` to collect all metrics.
Optional. Enable or disable the category explicitly. Default is `true`.
Optional. The name of metrics that will be streamed. "allMetrics" includes all possible metrics for the resource. Set to `[]` to disable metric collection.
Optional. A string indicating whether the export to Log Analytics should use the default destination type, i.e. AzureDiagnostics, or use a destination type.

Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic log analytics workspace. For security reasons, it is recommended to set diagnostic settings to send data to either storage account, log analytics workspace or event hub.

Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic storage account. For security reasons, it is recommended to set diagnostic settings to send data to either storage account, log analytics workspace or event hub.
Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic event hub authorization rule for the Event Hubs namespace in which the event hub should be created or streamed to.

Optional. Name of the diagnostic event hub within the namespace to which logs are streamed. Without this, an event hub is created for each log category. For security reasons, it is recommended to set diagnostic settings to send data to either storage account, log analytics workspace or event hub.
Optional. The full ARM resource ID of the Marketplace resource to which you would like to send Diagnostic Logs.
An AVM-aligned type for a diagnostic setting. To be used if both logs & metrics are supported by the resource provider.
Optional. Specify the name of lock.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
An AVM-aligned type for a lock.
Optional. Enables system assigned managed identity on the resource.
Optional. The resource ID(s) to assign to the resource. Required if a user assigned identity is used for encryption.
An AVM-aligned type for a managed identity configuration. To be used if both a system-assigned & user-assigned identities are supported by the resource provider.
Optional. The name of the Private Endpoint.
Optional. The location to deploy the Private Endpoint to.
Optional. The name of the private link connection to create.
Optional. The subresource to deploy the Private Endpoint for. For example "vault" for a Key Vault Private Endpoint.
Required. Resource ID of the subnet where the endpoint needs to be created.
Optional. The private DNS Zone Group to configure for the Private Endpoint.
Optional. If Manual Private Link Connection is required.
Optional. A message passed to the owner of the remote resource with the manual connection request.
Optional. Custom DNS configurations.
Optional. A list of IP configurations of the Private Endpoint. This will be used to map to the first-party Service endpoints.
Optional. Application security groups in which the Private Endpoint IP configuration is included.
Optional. The custom name of the network interface attached to the Private Endpoint.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Optional. Tags to be applied on all resources/Resource Groups in this deployment.
Optional. Enable/Disable usage telemetry for module.
Optional. Specify if you want to deploy the Private Endpoint into a different Resource Group than the main resource.

An AVM-aligned type for a private endpoint. To be used if the private endpoint's default service / groupId can be assumed (i.e., for services that only have one Private Endpoint type like 'vault' for key vault).
Optional. The name (as GUID) of the role assignment. If not provided, a GUID will be generated.

Required. The role to assign. You can provide either the display name of the role definition, the role definition GUID, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
An AVM-aligned type for a role assignment.
An exported secret's references.
A map of the exported secrets
Required. The name of Cognitive Services account.
Required. Kind of the Cognitive Services account. Use 'Get-AzCognitiveServicesAccountSku' to determine a valid combinations of 'kind' and 'SKU' for your Azure region.
Optional. SKU of the Cognitive Services account. Use 'Get-AzCognitiveServicesAccountSku' to determine a valid combinations of 'kind' and 'SKU' for your Azure region.
Optional. Location for all Resources.
Optional. The diagnostic settings of the service.

Optional. Whether or not public network access is allowed for this resource. For security reasons it should be disabled. If not specified, it will be disabled by default if private endpoints are set and networkAcls are not set.
Conditional. Subdomain name used for token-based authentication. Required if 'networkAcls' or 'privateEndpoints' are set.
Optional. A collection of rules governing the accessibility from specific network locations.
Optional. Configuration details for private endpoints. For security reasons, it is recommended to use private endpoints whenever possible.
Optional. The lock settings of the service.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. List of allowed FQDN.
Optional. The API properties for special APIs.
Optional. Allow only Azure AD authentication. Should be enabled for security reasons.
Optional. The customer managed key definition.
Optional. The flag to enable dynamic throttling.
Optional. Resource migration token.
Optional. Restore a soft-deleted cognitive service at deployment time. Will fail if no such soft-deleted resource exists.
Optional. Restrict outbound network access.
Optional. The storage accounts for this resource.
Optional. The managed identity definition for this resource.
Optional. Enable/Disable usage telemetry for module.
Optional. Array of deployments about cognitive service accounts to create.
Optional. Key vault reference and secret settings for the module's secrets export.

variables.formattedUserAssignedIdentities: [reduce(map(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('managedIdentities'), 'userAssignedResourceIds'), createArray()), lambda('id', createObject(format('{0}', lambdaVariables('id')), createObject()))), createObject(), lambda('cur', 'next', union(lambdaVariables('cur'), lambdaVariables('next'))))]
variables.identity: [if(not(empty(parameters('managedIdentities'))), createObject('type', if(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('managedIdentities'), 'systemAssigned'), false()), if(not(empty(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('managedIdentities'), 'userAssignedResourceIds'), createObject()))), 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned', 'SystemAssigned'), if(not(empty(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('managedIdentities'), 'userAssignedResourceIds'), createObject()))), 'UserAssigned', null())), 'userAssignedIdentities', if(not(empty(variables('formattedUserAssignedIdentities'))), variables('formattedUserAssignedIdentities'), null())), null())]

properties.networkAcls: [if(not(empty(coalesce(parameters('networkAcls'), createObject()))), createObject('defaultAction', tryGet(parameters('networkAcls'), 'defaultAction'), 'virtualNetworkRules', coalesce(tryGet(parameters('networkAcls'), 'virtualNetworkRules'), createArray()), 'ipRules', coalesce(tryGet(parameters('networkAcls'), 'ipRules'), createArray())), null())]
properties.encryption: [if(not(empty(parameters('customerManagedKey'))), createObject('keySource', 'Microsoft.KeyVault', 'keyVaultProperties', createObject('identityClientId', if(not(empty(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('customerManagedKey'), 'userAssignedIdentityResourceId'), ''))), reference('cMKUserAssignedIdentity').clientId, null()), 'keyVaultUri', reference('cMKKeyVault').vaultUri, 'keyName', parameters('customerManagedKey').keyName, 'keyVersion', if(not(empty(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('customerManagedKey'), 'keyVersion'), ''))), parameters('customerManagedKey').keyVersion, last(split(reference('cMKKeyVault::cMKKey').keyUriWithVersion, '/'))))), null())]

properties.notes: [if(equals(tryGet(parameters('lock'), 'kind'), 'CanNotDelete'), 'Cannot delete resource or child resources.', 'Cannot delete or modify the resource or child resources.')]

parameters.privateLinkServiceConnections: [if(not(equals(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'isManualConnection'), true())), createObject('value', createArray(createObject('name', coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'privateLinkServiceConnectionName'), format('{0}-{1}-{2}', last(split(resourceId('Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts', parameters('name')), '/')), coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'service'), 'account'), copyIndex())), 'properties', createObject('privateLinkServiceId', resourceId('Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts', parameters('name')), 'groupIds', createArray(coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'service'), 'account')))))), createObject('value', null()))]
parameters.manualPrivateLinkServiceConnections: [if(equals(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'isManualConnection'), true()), createObject('value', createArray(createObject('name', coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'privateLinkServiceConnectionName'), format('{0}-{1}-{2}', last(split(resourceId('Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts', parameters('name')), '/')), coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'service'), 'account'), copyIndex())), 'properties', createObject('privateLinkServiceId', resourceId('Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts', parameters('name')), 'groupIds', createArray(coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'service'), 'account')), 'requestMessage', coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'manualConnectionRequestMessage'), 'Manual approval required.'))))), createObject('value', null()))]

metadata.name: Private Endpoints
metadata.description: This module deploys a Private Endpoint.
Optional. The name of the Private DNS Zone Group.
Required. The private DNS zone groups to associate the private endpoint. A DNS zone group can support up to 5 DNS zones.
Optional. The name (as GUID) of the role assignment. If not provided, a GUID will be generated.

Required. The role to assign. You can provide either the display name of the role definition, the role definition GUID, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
Optional. Specify the name of lock.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
Required. The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group.

Required. The ID of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to. If used with private link service connection, this property must be defined as empty string.

Required. The member name of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to. If used with private link service connection, this property must be defined as empty string.
Required. A private IP address obtained from the private endpoint's subnet.
Required. Properties of private endpoint IP configurations.
Required. The name of the private link service connection.

Required. The ID of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to. If used with private link service connection, this property must be defined as empty string array `[]`.
Required. The resource id of private link service.
Optional. A message passed to the owner of the remote resource with this connection request. Restricted to 140 chars.
Required. Properties of private link service connection.
Required. The name of the private link service connection.

Required. The ID of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to. If used with private link service connection, this property must be defined as empty string array `[]`.
Required. The resource id of private link service.
Optional. A message passed to the owner of the remote resource with this connection request. Restricted to 140 chars.
Required. Properties of private link service connection.
Required. Fqdn that resolves to private endpoint IP address.
Required. A list of private IP addresses of the private endpoint.
Optional. The name of the private DNS zone group config.
Required. The resource id of the private DNS zone.
Required. Name of the private endpoint resource to create.
Required. Resource ID of the subnet where the endpoint needs to be created.
Optional. Application security groups in which the private endpoint IP configuration is included.
Optional. The custom name of the network interface attached to the private endpoint.
Optional. A list of IP configurations of the private endpoint. This will be used to map to the First Party Service endpoints.
Optional. The private DNS zone group to configure for the private endpoint.
Optional. Location for all Resources.
Optional. The lock settings of the service.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Optional. Tags to be applied on all resources/resource groups in this deployment.
Optional. Custom DNS configurations.
Optional. A grouping of information about the connection to the remote resource. Used when the network admin does not have access to approve connections to the remote resource.
Optional. A grouping of information about the connection to the remote resource.
Optional. Enable/Disable usage telemetry for module.

properties.notes: [if(equals(tryGet(parameters('lock'), 'kind'), 'CanNotDelete'), 'Cannot delete resource or child resources.', 'Cannot delete or modify the resource or child resources.')]

metadata.name: Private Endpoint Private DNS Zone Groups
metadata.description: This module deploys a Private Endpoint Private DNS Zone Group.
Optional. The name of the private DNS zone group config.
Required. The resource id of the private DNS zone.
Conditional. The name of the parent private endpoint. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. Array of private DNS zone configurations of the private DNS zone group. A DNS zone group can support up to 5 DNS zones.
Optional. The name of the private DNS zone group.
The name of the private endpoint DNS zone group.
The resource ID of the private endpoint DNS zone group.
The resource group the private endpoint DNS zone group was deployed into.
The resource group the private endpoint was deployed into.
The resource ID of the private endpoint.
The name of the private endpoint.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The custom DNS configurations of the private endpoint.
The IDs of the network interfaces associated with the private endpoint.
The group Id for the private endpoint Group.

secretsToSet.value: [union(createArray(), if(contains(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'accessKey1Name'), createArray(createObject('name', parameters('secretsExportConfiguration').accessKey1Name, 'value', listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts', parameters('name')), '2023-05-01').key1)), createArray()), if(contains(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'accessKey2Name'), createArray(createObject('name', parameters('secretsExportConfiguration').accessKey2Name, 'value', listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts', parameters('name')), '2023-05-01').key2)), createArray()))]

metadata.description: The resourceId of the exported secret.
The secret URI of the exported secret.
The secret URI with version of the exported secret.
An AVM-aligned type for the output of the secret set via the secrets export feature.
Required. The name of the secret to set.
Required. The value of the secret to set.
An AVM-aligned type for the secret to set via the secrets export feature.
Required. The name of the Key Vault to set the ecrets in.
Required. The secrets to set in the Key Vault.
The references to the secrets exported to the provided Key Vault.
The name of the cognitive services account.
The resource ID of the cognitive services account.
The resource group the cognitive services account was deployed into.
The service endpoint of the cognitive services account.
All endpoints available for the cognitive services account, types depends on the cognitive service kind.
The principal ID of the system assigned identity.
The location the resource was deployed into.
A hashtable of references to the secrets exported to the provided Key Vault. The key of each reference is each secret's name.
The private endpoints of the congitive services account.
